meanings.definition: Relating to the branch of medicine that deals with disorders of the stomach and intestines.
meanings.sent1: The gastroenterological treatment helped with my stomach issues.
meanings.sent2: The doctor's gastroenterological expertise was evident in the diagnosis.
meanings.sent3: I never thought I'd be so fascinated by gastroenterological discussions.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of gastroenterological matters was as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The gastroenterological clinic was a hub of healing for many.

meanings.sent1: The gastroenterological was highly recommended for my digestive problems.
meanings.sent2: I have an appointment with the gastroenterological next week.
meanings.sent3: The gastroenterological had a great sense of humor during the consultation.
meanings.sent4: She was a gastroenterological wizard, solving stomach mysteries.
meanings.sent5: The gastroenterological's passion for helping patients was inspiring.
